game.name: Marvel's Spider-Man 2
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Adjustable Text Size, Camera Comfort, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Narrated Game Menus, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Subtitle Options, Surround Sound, Steam Cloud, HDR available, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 함께. 더 강해져라. 많은 호평을 받은 스파이더맨 프랜차이즈 신규 챕터의 PC 버전에서는 피터 파커와 마일즈 모랄레스가 삶, 우정, 그리고 수호자의 의무 사이에서 균형을 찾는 사이, 심비오트의 강력한 힘이 그들을 절박한 싸움으로 몰아넣습니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Be Greater. Together. The incredible power of the symbiote forces Peter Parker and Miles Morales into a desperate fight as they balance their lives, friendships, and their duty to protect in an exciting chapter of the critically acclaimed Spider-Man franchise on PC.

reviewHighlights.text: nothing wrong with game play but, it runs horribly even tho i have recommended gpu ram and cpu better then recommended. my settings are set to almost...
This is the best Spiderman game available in terms of gameplay. In terms of story, content available, and performance however, it is the least of the...
